definition: after one's heart (idiom); gratifying and satisfactory/everything one could wish
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Sunday well-spent brings a week of content.
sentences.chinese: 充实度过的星期天带来称心如意的一周。

sentences.english: and it seems like everything's lining up in my favor.
sentences.chinese: 每一件事都很称心如意，我就觉得非常幸运。

sentences.english: The compensations for the injuries seldom yield complete satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 伤害赔偿很少使受害人称心如意。

sentences.english: I regard them as my most agreeable companion.
sentences.chinese: 我把它们看作是我最称心如意的伴侣。

sentences.english: Sometimes in life we get exactly what we expect.
sentences.chinese: 人生有时候会让我们称心如意，所得即所想。

sentences.english: Melissa continued to ride a bike agreeable to play.
sentences.chinese: 梅莉莎继续称心如意地骑着自行车玩耍。

sentences.english: Even before he became sick, however, his life was no bed of roses.
sentences.chinese: 但是，即使在患病前，他的生活并没有称心如意。

sentences.english: Grandpa to pick a contentment every year Spring Festival couplets.
sentences.chinese: 外公每年都要挑选一幅称心如意的好春联。

sentences.english: The mother of Mencius removed three times in order to reach a desirable neighbourhood.
sentences.chinese: 孟母三迁，为的是找一个称心如意的邻居。

definition: to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
as one wants/according to one's wishes/ruyi scepter, a symbol of power and good fortune
lit. the divine steed Feihuang gallops (idiom)/fig. to achieve meteoric success in one's career
to climb step by step/to rise steadily/on the up and up
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
